name: LD47-Loop Robot
description:
One for the LD 47 theme: Stuck in a loop

I came up with some android AI looping things, to make this little puzzle game.

I myself, not a great coder, took me a long time to code it right. So there is not much time left for me to make more decent level nah.

Anyway, enjoy!

Update v1.1:

#1 Rewrite bgm and audio, hope you like it

#2 Add game speed change button, fix a small bug
